sentence.text: She bit Doyle 's fingers and jerked her mouth free of them , shouting the words that came into her head .
Vologsky tensed himself , then jerked his arm free .
She jerked her arm free and ran to where Bernard was standing .
The insect jerks itself free and hangs on the empty pupa case , its body trembling .
I jerk my arms wide , break his grip .
He jerked a finger at Auguste .
Albert stood up and jerked his head at Carrie .
` 'Poor sot , " he lisped , jerking his thumb at Charles Brandon .
Baptiste jerked his head at her , then disappeared into the darkness in the direction of Rose 's cottage .
She jerked her chin at the box of letters .
Curtis jerked a thumb at the empty doorway through which the doctor had just exited .
Marius jerked his head at them in disapproval but I liked their Romany appeal .
` That 's yours , " he said , jerking his thumb towards a white-swathed slab under the window .
She jerked her head towards number three .
He jerked his head towards the bar door .
Carrying to the block a lump so heavy that it made his shoulders ache , he jerked his head towards the end of the stables and asked , panting : ` What 's down there ? "
She jerked her head towards the far wall .

He jerked his head slightly towards the other end of the bar where someone was describing to the lady in question some event which seemed to involve a great deal of grappling with her unresisting frame .
Michael Swinton jerked his head towards them .
Alexei jerked his hand away from his cheek , then laughed to dismiss the subject .
Isabel jerked her hand from his , holding it out as though to ward him off .
Suddenly Stephen jerked his hand from her grasp and gripped her shoulder .
Iris jerked her head in the direction of the telephone .
When the big fish needs to eat other little fish , it signals it is switching back into normal hunting mode by jerking its jaw in a particular way .
She was bending over the sail locker , and she jerked her head up to stare at him , dropping the lid with a bang , instantly suspicious .
I leaned forward , put my thumb under my lip and jerked it up to give him a close-up view of the long gash and the trailing blood-stained ends of the stitches .
Kids are jumping , twitching , jerking their arms .
Frau Nordern jerked her chin .
The morose boatwoman jerked an elbow .
She clicked her tongue quietly as the pup jerked his limbs .
Her fingers closed on something hard and unyielding , like cold steel , and she jerked her hand upwards , thrusting the metal towards his chest .
He jerked his hand away .
It took a second for the words to sink home , but when they did she jerked her head back and swatted his hand away .
Leonora flushed scarlet as she jerked her head away .
Adam jerked his leg back as the pain seared up his muscles .
She touched her but the woman jerked away .
Recollecting herself suddenly , she jerked away sharply .
With a howl of pain , he jerked back and sat huddled in his seat , trying to soothe the burning sensation .
In one scene John bawled so loudly into her deaf aid that her head jerked back and hit a clock .
She jerked back convulsively .
The cop 's head jerks back involuntarily .
Isabel gasped , jerking back as though he had struck her .
This was the moment when Melody chose to knock at the door and Anna 's head jerked back , away from him .
The words were uttered with such venom that Sabine 's head jerked back in shock .
Ted jerked up like a man who 'd been zapped with a thousand volts .
His head had jerked up when I leapt to my feet -- now it sank back on to his hollow chest .
Startled , Jane 's head jerked up .
The soldier woke up with a snort ; his head jerked up and he looked at us inquiringly .
His knee jerked up and down to the clacking of the metronome on the piano lid .
Their bodies jerked up and down , twisting and jumping .
His face jerked up and his lips seemed to curl inwards in a snarl .
Her head jerked up with pride .
Hector 's head jerked up , but was restrained by his mistress 's hand .
Vi jerked back her shoulders .
Isabelle hits him and he jerks up his head , his eyes wide and glassy .
Harry jerked up his head distrustfully , eyes flaring wide .
Her head jerked around .
The woman gave a nervous start , her hands jerking in a little , agitated movement .
Ruth jerked round , the sheer force of that voice turning her .
He thrust the photographs back into his pocket and jerked round .
His head jerked round to look at her , and he missed a gear change .
Startled , she jerked backwards , her breath catching in her throat .
He jerked forward as if physically attacked ready to defend himself .
On one end of the mast a figure jerked spasmodically .
Suddenly afraid , she jerked upright .
Ewen went as white as paper , and jerked upright in his chair .
Garty 's head jerked violently sideways ; he lurched , stumbled , almost fell , then seemed to find his balance again .
Slowly Tommy placed his arm on the floor , his whole body jerking with fear .
If his body jerked when he was struck again , and fatally , it was no more than an instant 's convulsion .
A muscle jerked in his jaw , and although he still retained the humorous gleam it did n't quite warm his eyes .
